reviewtext: The Olympus D460 is really awesome. I have owned a few of these types of cameras already, from the "early days" of digital photography and onward. This camera is really refined, they cleaned up alot of earlier  mistakes and made the whole experience a pleasure. I very highly recommend  digital photography and this camera in particular. Meanwhile, Yahoo has set  up a service to upload these pictures and have them printed on photo paper.  All in all, you can't miss.
